name: Fogbugz - DarkBugz
description: A high-contrast dark theme for FogBugz (a leading software bug tracking service).
additional_info:
Known issues:
    The default logo (top left corner)has some raster shadowing applied and thus looks a little fugly.
    Editors (Rich Text, HTML, and single line text) are white background.
    Row selection in the List Cases view still results in bright yellow rows.  This is a flash thing I suspect as I cannot find any CSS for it...

Fixes:
2012/02/01 - Added styling to email content in Case view.
             Styled Add Case in Case List

Be sure to set this to run on your portion of the domain (i.e. MyOrganization.fogbugz.com).

Kiln styling coming soon.
